| Overview                = The Unknown Council is a new elite sect of [[Hydra (Earth-616)|Hydra]] composed of rotten, terrorist spies who don't even trust one another. Their existence is kept a secret from other members of Hydra.{{r|{{cite web|url=http://www.cbr.com/remender-rebuilds-a-many-headed-hydra-in-all-new-captain-america/|title=Remender Rebuilds a Many-Headed Hydra in “All-New Captain America”|work=CBR|first=Dave|last=Richards|date=3 December 2014|accessdate=9 December 2019}}}}

| HistoryText             = After [[Steven Rogers (Earth-616)|Steve Rogers]] chose [[Samuel Wilson (Earth-616)|Sam Wilson]] as his successor to the mantle of [[Captain America]], the Unknown Council held a meeting at [[Castle Hydra]] where they discussed twisting Sam into whatever shape they needed.{{r|Captain America Vol 7 25}}
